entry.title: About
entry.content:
Welcome to my site, it's my pleasure to meet you!
欢迎来到我的小站呀，很高兴遇见你！🤝

🏠 About this website 关于本站

This website is established based on a static website app called Gridea. Under this app, all passage and creatings can be make soleby markdown.

Don't know what to do though, とりあえず何かを書きましょうか.

👨‍💻 About me 博主是谁

A student, a developer

badminton & languages
